'''''"Potapo's Solidarity"''''' is an [[achievement]] set in the category ''[[Duelist: Series II]]''.

The achievements are earned by defeating the [[Local Legend]] {{Enemy|Biting-Cold Wayob Manifestation|text="Potapo's Solidarity" — Will of Rivalry and Battle}} while completing challenge conditions.
